casebody.data:
First Department,

May, 1938.

(May 3, 1938.) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Holland Radio Stores, Inc., and “John” Lewis, Defendants, Impleaded with Ralph Holland, Named in the Infomation Herein as “John Doe,” Appellant.

Judgment of conviction unanimously reversed and the information dismissed upon the ground that the defendant Ralph Holland was not shown to have participated in any of the acts charged in the information. Present ■— Martin, P. J., Townley, Glennon, Untermyer and Cohn, JJ.
